Legal_Issue: Whether the Applicants have satisfied the tri-partite test for a stay of removal
Outcome: The motion for a stay of removal is dismissed
Procedural_Context: Motion for a stay of removal
Evidence_Type: Lack of clear evidence of irreparable harm
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to show error in H&C Officer's decision, lack of irreparable harm, public interest in enforcing removal
Application_Error: Applicants failed to show an error in the H&C Officer's decision
Assessment_Standard: Serious issue to be tried, irreparable harm, balance of convenience
Legal_Standard: Tri-partite test for stay of removal
Application_Factor: Public interest in enforcing removal orders
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Tri-partite test: (1) serious issue to be tried, (2) irreparable harm, (3) balance of convenience
Cause_of_Refusal: Applicants did not meet the tri-partite test criteria
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of clear evidence of irreparable harm
